name: Fork and Knives the Video Game
name_original: Fork and Knives the Video Game
description:
Forks and Knives is based on the song of the same name by  the band; Chance & The Lucky Aces. 

The game sees you break into their mansion with the aim of stealing the ingredients to their world famous Lucky Aces  Grog. 

Steal the right ingredients, and you might get to meet the Queen of England. 

Arrow keys to move.

As a kid who grew up in the eighties with a ZX spectrum, this game has been inspired by the likes of Manic Miner - though a lot simpler!
